item.title: Shooting a fly with a statemap
item.description: My keyboard is bouncing as I type this. My new keyboard. My favorite keyboard. The DMOTE.

item.title: DMOTE Build Log
item.description: After the Dactyl lost favor, I started toying around with a fork of a fork, the Dactyl Manuform: Opposable Thumb Edition or DMOTE for short.

item.title: Dactyl Build Log
item.description: After a while with typing on a goldtouch, I bought a Kinesis Advantage as I missed having thumb keys and typing on my M-x Butterfly is an unmitigated ergonomic disaster.

item.title: M-x Butterfly Build Log
item.description: Once, shortly after college, I built a keyboard.
